words.definition: Blood is the red liquid in your body.
words.example: I cut my finger and got blood on my shirt.

words.definition: To burn something is to set it on fire.
words.example: I burned some wood in the camp fire.

words.definition: A cell is a small room where a person is locked in.
words.example: The jail cell was very small.

words.definition: To contain something is to have it inside.
words.example: The mailbox contained a letter.

words.definition: If something is correct, it is right.
words.example: He gave the correct answer to the question.

words.definition: A crop is food that is grown by farmers.
words.example: The corn crop was very good this year.

words.definition: To demand is to say that you want something.
words.example: I demanded that my money be returned.

words.definition: If two things are equal, they are the same.
words.example: Two plus two equals four.

words.definition: To feed is to give food to something.
words.example: I fed the dog.

words.definition: A hole is an empty space in something.
words.example: I dug a hole in the ground.

words.definition: To increase is to make something larger.
words.example: I increased the volume of the radio.

words.definition: A lord is a powerful man in old times.
words.example: The lord lived in a large castle.

words.definition: To owe is to have to pay money to someone.
words.example: I owe him some money.

words.definition: A position is the way someone is sitting or standing.
words.example: I changed my position on the couch.

words.definition: To raise is to lift something.
words.example: I raised my hand.

words.definition: If you are responsible, you do what you should do.
words.example: I am responsible for my own work.

words.definition: A sight is something you see.
words.example: The Grand Canyon is a beautiful sight.

words.definition: A spot is a small place.
words.example: I found a good spot for my towel.

words.definition: A structure is a building.
words.example: The structure was very old.

words.definition: If something is whole, it is all of it.
words.example: I ate the whole pizza.
